column4: ConfusedButEnthused: rejoined as CUBED.  Still looking for advice on Lexmark print driver for 8.04 not getting past root password screen in 9.10.
I cannot get Lexmark X2600 driver that was written for 8.04 to install on 9.10 due to root password edit failure.  Any ideas?
Yes, the install setup prompts and prompts with right password entered every time.
